frontend_subdomain: <Name of the site, used for example in <SITE_NAME>.domain.com>
backend_subdomain: <Name of the tile server, e.g. <SITE_NAME>-tilerserver.domain.com. Tile server record is always created, even if enable_route53_record is false.>
alternate_domains: <Externally registered domain for the frontend (only if enable_route53_record is false)>
alternate_domain_certificate_arn: <ARN for an imported external certificate (only if enable_route53_record is false)>
prefix: <Name of the deployment in case of multiple parallel deploys>
bastion_public_key: <Public key you want to use to access the vpc with ssh>
